metadata.title: CVE-2023-4908 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Picture in Picture in Google Chrome priorto 117.0.5938.62 allowed a remote attacker to spoof security UI via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
